description.@en: A powerful blast of seawater and coral stings your foes, knocking them about

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you conjure forth a briny, powerful blast of water and dangerously sharp coral. All those who are caught within the Cone Template suffers[[/roll 2D10]]+[WB] in Damage. This Magick also extinguishes Mildly and Moderately Dangerous fire and those who are already On Fire.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but all foes caught in the Saltwater Blast are knocked Prone.

criticalFailure.@en: A briny blast of water washes up over you from below your feet. You suffer [[/roll 2D10]]+[WB] in Damage and are knocked Prone.
